Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope your Holiday season has been restful and enjoyable! I'm just following up with an email I sent earlier regarding the opportunity to have our motivational team visit your school this year. As a reminder, our 2013/2014 presentation theme is "Kindness Changes Everything" and we're seeing it positively impact the culture in Canadian schools each and every day.
